channel.title: Posts on Himalayan Yoga
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Himalayan Yoga

item.title: About Himalayan Yoga
item.description: Himalayan Yoga centre was founded by Guru Sanjeev Yogi, who began practicing yoga at the tender age of nine and continued to deepen his practise as he grew. After receiving profound knowledge in yoga and other vedic science and physical science and physical education. He is completed Yogshastra and b.ped, m.ped and M.phill in physical education. Sanjeev Yogi decided to spread the knowledge to as many as possible. He started the Himalayan yoga centre with the purpose of spreading the knowledge of yoga in its purity.

item.title: Yoga Teacher Training
item.description: 200 Hours Yoga Teacher Training YOGA TRAINING learn yoga in the HIMALAYAN YOGA offer comprehensive Ashtanga Yoga, Hatha Yoga Teacher training programs for 200 hours, in dharamshala, Mcleodganj. Himalayan yoga is registered with government of india. The Yoga teacher training courses in India are in-depth and follow the guidelines as listed by HIMALAYAN YOGA. Yoga is known for its therapeutic benefits.At Himalayan Yoga, We teach the therapeutic style of yoga and Himalayan yoga History.
